input.sentences: the two of us decided it was time to see the sights .
we saw the clinton memorial | which is a much larger version of another memorial .
we saw some other things that we really can not describe though .
we all had a lot of fun going and looking around .
i wish we could go next year | but it 's so expensive
output.sentences: The two best friends decided to take some time off and enjoy the sights.
The large memorial in the background was in the picture they took.
The friends try to describe the rows of bricks but could not.
The friends had lots of fun meeting new people.
The trip was a expensive trip but to them it was worth every Penney
